bio: I’m Rohit Kumar, a Computer Science student from UPES Dehradun, specializing in Graphics and Gaming. I'm passionate about crafting immersive experiences through game development, intelligent systems, and web solutions.

My journey spans from designing predictive AI in racing games using Unity ML-Agents to developing real-time fleet tracking systems for the Indian Army. I also enjoy designing scalable web apps that solve real-world problems—like smart waste management systems and restaurant portals.
Whether it’s coding gameplay mechanics or architecting backend systems, I love building things that users actually enjoy and rely on.
